attributes.action: ensure that all convicted criminals sentenced to imprisonment lose all rights under the Human Rights Act.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Think more about the victims of crime and their rights instead of those people who put themselves outside of the law for their own gain.  Foreign nationals/immigrants should be deported immediately once convicted of ANY crime.  They have abused our hospitality!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
